description: This file defines a JiraApiService class that provides methods to interact with Jira's REST API, including verifying credentials, fetching projects, project details, and issues by type. It encapsulates API call logic and authentication handling.

classes.name: JiraApiService
classes.description: A service class providing methods to interact with Jira's REST API, including authentication, project retrieval, and issue fetching.

methods.name: createAuthHeader
methods.description: Creates a Basic Authentication header using JiraCredentials.

methods.name: getProxyBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the fixed proxy base URL used for all API calls.

methods.name: verifyCredentials
methods.description: Verifies Jira credentials by calling the 'myself' endpoint.

methods.name: fetchProjects
methods.description: Fetches a list of Jira projects accessible with the provided credentials.

methods.name: fetchProjectDetails
methods.description: Fetches detailed information for a specific Jira project identified by projectKey.

methods.name: fetchIssuesByType
methods.description: Fetches issues of a specific type within a project.
